title: Investors eagerly buy the dip — here are the losing stocks that became winners Thursday
text:
On Dec. 2, the Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA rose 1.8%, reversing its 1.3% slide the previous day. The benchmark S&P 500 Index SPX climbed 1.4%, following the previous session's 1.2% slide. And the Nasdaq Composite Index COMP was up 0.8%, partially making up for the previous day's 1.8% decline.

On Dec. 2, 82% of S&P 500 stocks rose at least 1%, after 57% had fallen at least that much the day before.
